price: Baranavuze bati “Yewe uwamanuriwe urwibutso (Qur’an)! Mu by’ukuri uri umusazi.”
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuhā alladhī nuzzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru innaka lamajnūnun
